author: Staff Reporter
text:
Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam on Tuesday called on his mother Palaniammal (86) at Gem Hospital and Research Centre in Coimbatore.

According to sources, Mr. Panneerselvam spent an hour by his mother’s side after arriving around 9.15 a.m.

Laparoscopic surgery

Ms. Palaniammal had undergone laparoscopic surgery for problems in the gallbladder on Monday and would be discharged by Thursday.
title: OPS meets his mother at hospital
